## Citations

You can cite things by using `[@cite-key]`. Here are four examples:

- I used the `{knitr}` package [@xie:2021].
- You can also add other things in the citation [e.g., @nijhawan:2015].
- @baumgartner:2021 seems to be an interesting book.
- Baumgartner and Silverman suggest that "The Office is cool" [-@baumgartner:2021, p. 43].

Note that everything you cited is included in the *References* section. This will also include any references you included in the `nocite:` YAML field in the `index.Rmd` file.
